content: leaf lace scarf by cayli harris specifications yarn 600 yards 2oz yarn chef creme brulee lace needles us 4 3 5mm gauge not terribly important as long as you like the fabric you are getting finished size blocked 74 x 11 unblocked about 60 long designed with intwined pattern studio intwinedstudio com page 1 of 3 repeat highlighted in yellow set up row co 69 sts k3 row row 1 rs k2 ssk yo k yo k3 *cdd k3 yo k yo k3 repeat from * 5 times cdd k3 yo k yo k2tog k2 row 2 ws k3 p63 k3 row 3 rs k2 ssk yo k yo k3 *cdd k3 yo k yo k3 repeat from * 5 times cdd k3 yo k yo k2tog k2 row 4 ws k3 p63 k3 row 5 rs k2 ssk yo k yo k3 *cdd k3 yo k yo k3 repeat from * 5 times cdd k3 yo k yo k2tog k2 row 6 ws k3 p63 k3 row 7 rs k2 ssk yo k2 yo k2 *cdd k2 yo k3 yo k2 repeat from * 5 times cdd k2 yo k2 yo k2tog k2 row 8 ws k3 p63 k3 row 9 rs k2 ssk yo k3 yo k *cdd k yo k5 yo k repeat from * 5 times cdd k yo k3 yo k2tog k2 row 10 ws k3 p63 k3 row 11 rs k2 ssk yo k4 yo *cdd yo k7 yo repeat from * 5 times cdd yo k4 yo k2tog k2 designed with intwined pattern studio intwinedstudio com page 2 of 3 row 12 ws k3 p63 k3 row 13 rs k2 ssk yo ssk k3 yo *k yo k3 cdd k3 yo repeat from * 5 times k yo k3 k2tog yo k2tog k2 row 14 ws k3 p63 k3 row 15 rs k2 ssk yo ssk k3 yo *k yo k3 cdd k3 yo repeat from * 5 times k yo k3 k2tog yo k2tog k2 row 16 ws k3 p63 k3 row 17 rs k2 ssk yo ssk k3 yo *k yo k3 cdd k3 yo repeat from * 5 times k yo k3 k2tog yo k2tog k2 row 18 ws k3 p63 k3 row 19 rs k2 ssk yo ssk k2 yo k1 *k2 yo k2 cdd k2 yo k1 repeat from * 5 times k2 yo k2 k2tog yo k2tog k2 row 20 ws k3 p63 k3 row 21 rs k2 ssk yo ssk k yo k2 *k3 yo k cdd k yo k2 repeat from * 5 times k3 yo k1 k2tog yo k2tog k2 row 22 ws k3 p63 k3 row 23 rs k2 ssk yo ssk yo k3 *k4 yo cdd yo k3 repeat from * 5 times k4 yo k2tog yo k2tog k2 row 24 ws k3 p63 k3 repeat row 1 through 24 until desired length k3 row bind off march 29 2010 for more designs by cayli harris please visit http //www ravelry com/designers/cayli-harris
